text: avar taṅṅaḷuṭe keṭṭukaḷ tuṟannunēākkiyappēāḷ taṅṅaḷ keāṇṭupēāya carakkukaḷ taṅṅaḷkku tanne tiriccukiṭṭiyatāyi kaṇṭu. appēāḻavar paṟaññu: "ñaṅṅaḷuṭe pitāvē, namukkiniyentuvēṇaṁ? nam'muṭe carakkukaḷitā namukku tanne tiriccukiṭṭiyirikkunnu. ñaṅṅaḷ pēāyi kuṭumbattin āvaśyamāya āhārasādhanaṅṅaḷ keāṇṭuvarāṁ. ñaṅṅaḷuṭe sahēādarane kātturakṣikkukayuṁ ceyyāṁ. oreāṭṭakattin cumakkāvunnatra dhān'yaṁ namukku kūṭutal kiṭṭumallēā. atrayuṁ kūṭutal aḷannukiṭṭukayennat vaḷare vēgaṁ sādhikkunna kāryamatre.”
